channel.title: Articles on YunFeng
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on YunFeng

item.title: Five
item.description: 日期显示测试 验证日期显示效果

item.title: Fourth
item.description: ==渡荆门送别== [唐代]李白 渡远荆门外， 来从楚国游。 山随平野尽， 江入大荒流。 月下飞天镜， 云生结海楼。 仍怜故乡水， 万里送行舟。

item.title: Third
item.description: ==离思五首其四== [唐代]元稹 曾经沧海难为水， 除却巫山不是云。 取次花丛懒回顾， 半缘修道半缘仙。

item.title: Second
item.description: 咏柳 碧玉妆成一树高 万条垂下绿丝绦 不知细叶谁裁出 二月春风似剪刀

item.title: First
item.description: Tencent game 腾讯游戏是一款风靡世界的腾讯手游 $$ x*x=x2 $$ <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> {{ partial "header.html" . }} </head> <body> <div class="list wrapper clearfix"> <span class="page-title">{{ partial "head.html" . }}</span> <hr> <!-- 在logblog的list将term引用代码过来 ，这判断在我的代码里面似乎用处不大--> {{ if isset .Data "Term" }} <h2 class="page-title">{{ .Data.Term }}</h2> {{ else }} <h2 class="page-title">{{ .Name }}</h2> {{ end }} <!-- 下面的排序按照发布时间来，功能参照了这个链接https://www.gohugo.org/doc/templates/list/ --> {{ range first 10 .Data.Pages.ByPublishDate }} <div class="article-display"> <h1 class="article-title"><a href="{{ .Permalink }}">{{ .Title }}</a></h1> <!

item.title: test-2
item.description: Table of Contents Move static content to static Create your Hugo configuration file Set your configuration publish folder to site Convert Jekyll templates to Hugo templates Convert Jekyll plugins to Hugo shortcodes Implementation Usage Finishing Touches Fix Content Clean Up A practical example in a diff Move static content to static Jekyll has a rule that any directory not starting with _ will be copied as-is to the _site output.

item.title: New
item.description: You have a to-do list that scrolls on for days. You are managing multiple projects, getting lots of email and messages on different messaging systems, managing finances and personal health habits and so much more. It all keeps piling up, and it can feel overwhelming. How do you keep up with it all? How do you find focus and peace and get stuff accomplished when you have too much on your plate?
